summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4970 for the improvement of the alley between block 2, Dawson's 2nd Addition, block 4, Albert Addition, and block 13, Hillman's Lake Front Addition Division No. 2, being the alley from Fremont Avenue to Dayton Avenue between North 77th Street and North 78th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same.
